fullText: James Corden's performance as Francis Henshall, the hungry servant desperate to please two masters, is a tour de force of physical comedy that had the audience in stitches.

rejectionReasoning: claude: This appears to be a single sentence excerpt or quote, not a complete review with an evaluative verdict about whether to see the show.; openai: The review text refers to James Corden's performance in 'One Man, Two Guvnors,' which is not part of the current Broadway run.
